backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining schools, teachers, trainings, reviews, blog posts, and user profiles with role‑based access control and admin CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to required frontend files, components, and test IDs for carousel and gallery updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, hooks, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx and setting page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React setup configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query, theming, header/footer layout, and page components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin gate component handling Internet Identity login, logout, and gated access to admin content.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Tabbed admin dashboard providing UI sections for managing schools, teachers, trainings, and reviews.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/R: Admin section listing reviews with school lookup and delete functionality using alert dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/S: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting schools with form dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/sections/T: Admin UI to list, create, and delete teachers, with school assignment and form dialogs.
Admin section for managing trainings, including creation with validation and deletion.
frontend/src/components/common/CopyLinkB: Button that copies a URL to the clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/SocialLin: Renders a row of social link icons, filtering out invalid links.
frontend/src/components/directory/Direct: Static informational sections explaining how the directory works and its benefits.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Displays a school card with image carousel, basic info, and navigation to the school detail page, using curated or fallback images.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Renders a list of teachers with avatars and specialization badges, or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Provides the footer with about text, quick navigation links, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with logo, navigation, social links, theme support, and a mobile dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/routing/RouterEr: Shows an error message and a link to return home when a router error occurs.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Displays an About section for a school, using a generated default description when none is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Defines an FAQ item interface and provides a default list of school-related FAQ entries.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Renders an FAQ accordion list for a school using provided questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Shows a clickable image gallery with a modal viewer, using default images when none are supplied.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolInq: A contact form component with validation and simulated submission for users to inquire about a school.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Displays a school’s location with an optional Google Maps embed and a link to open the location in Google Maps.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolPro: A banner component with a slideshow of images, navigation controls, and school name/location overlay.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Fetches and displays school reviews, shows rating summaries, and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Shows a list of training courses with metadata and navigation to detailed curriculum pages, plus an explore-scroll feature.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Embeds a YouTube video for the school by extracting the video ID from various URL formats or shows a fallback message.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Fetches and lists similar schools or shows loading and empty states when applicable.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Exports a list of social link configurations with labels, empty URLs, and associated icons.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminReviews: Provides hooks to fetch all reviews across schools for admins and a placeholder mutation for deleting reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminSchools: Offers admin hooks to list, create, update, and delete schools using backend actor calls with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTeacher: Implements hooks for admins to fetch teachers across schools and create or delete teacher records.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminTrainin: Supplies hooks to load all trainings for admins and to create or delete training entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Provides hooks for fetching all blog posts or a single post through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, stored identity handling, and identity provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches a school's trainings and teachers with react-query and returns loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Loads a school plus its teachers and trainings, exposing data, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Retrieves reviews for a school and provides a mutation to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches all schools and optionally filters them by training hours, including training lookups.
Fetches schools filtered by country, state, and city via backend location API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Finds similar schools by comparing training hours and returns the top matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Loads a school and a specific training for curriculum pages and returns data with loading/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark mode styling.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Provides structured logging for backend call failures with timestamps and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/blogContent.ts: Utility functions for generating excerpts, splitting content into paragraphs, and selecting display excerpts.
frontend/src/lib/curatedSchoolMedia.ts: Returns curated media assets for certain schools, including thumbnails and gallery images.
frontend/src/lib/locationFormat.ts: Formats structured location data, sanitizes segments, and detects structured locations.
frontend/src/lib/locationRoutes.ts: Builds URL paths and breadcrumbs for structured locations with encoding helpers.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Deterministically maps school IDs to demo thumbnail images using a simple hash.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with mission details and feature cards describing community, certification, and global reach.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Checks Internet Identity authentication and wraps the admin dashboard with an access gate.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of blog posts with loading, error, and empty states, including card previews and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single blog post with full content, handling loading, error, and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and a placeholder contact form with non-functional submission.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Implements a school directory with hour-based filters, scroll navigation, and loading/error handling for fetched school data.
frontend/src/pages/LocationListingPage.t: Lists yoga schools for a decoded country/state/city, handling loading, errors, and empty results with UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed school information including banner, about section, courses, media, reviews, and inquiry form with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Provides informational UI about submitting or claiming a school listing, with disabled future-action buttons and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: Shows detailed curriculum info for a specific training program with navigation, loading/error handling, and course overview sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project state, goals, architectural notes, and known issues for building a WordPress-based responsive Yoga Schools Directory with seeding, admin dashboard, routing constraints, and UI/layout bugs. Serves as a high-level specification and issue tracker for the current build.
